Title: Dragon Ball Z: Broly - Second Coming
Writer: Akira Toriyama (original manga "Dragon Ball"), Takao Koyama (screenplay)
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Takeshi Kusao, Yûko Minaguchi
Plot: After seven years went by, Gohan grows up during the time around Goten's birth. Goku died and when Goten cries, Broly regains life and the Z warriors must stop him again.
